name: OhmConnect
description: $50 credit plus bill savings; rewards for reducing energy during peak periods; can get free/discounted smart thermostat and smart plug
fullDescription: OhmConnect is a free program that pays Californians to reduce energy use during peak demand times, while offering bonuses and free smart home devices.
whatTheyOffer:
- $50 sign-up credit
- Earn rewards for reducing energy during peak hours
- Free or discounted smart thermostat
- Free smart plugs for automation
- Cash rewards via PayPal or gift cards
- No cost to participate
howToGetIt:
1. Sign up free on OhmConnect website
2. Connect your utility account
3. Receive #OhmHour alerts during peak demand
4. Reduce energy use during those periods
5. Earn points redeemable for cash/prizes
6. Automate savings with free smart devices
